Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43806 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.2.0.azl4-1, affected by CVE-2024-43806
